description: Web3/ACC : Hongkong Before Consensus HK 2026 kicks off, join us for an exclusive side event celebrating Hong Kong's vibrant role as a Web3 hub. Connect with fellow innovators, thought leaders and talent shaping the future of web3. This is your opportunity to build meaningful connections before the main stage. Event Details Date : 11th February, 2026 Time : 3:30PM - 7:30PM HKT Sponsors Pharos Network: Inclusive Financial Layer-1 for RealFi, where real value and institutional grade assets are accessible to all. Website Twitter (X) Discord ProdigyFi: An onchain marketplace that turns market volatility into real yield through a simple one click experience. Website Twitter (X) Telegram What to expect? Networking with top founders and builders in web3 Light snacks and drinks to relax Cool swags for free (tshirts, stickers, hoodies & Etc) Keynote sessions from sponsors of the event
